extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.ToolHeader with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.m.OverflowToolbar.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.NavigationListItem with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Item.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.tnt.SideNavigation.!description: The SideNavigation control is a container, which consists of flexible and fixed parts on top of each other. The flexible part adapts its size to the fixed one. The flexible part has a scrollbar when the content is larger than the available space. Whenever the height of the whole control is less than 256 pixels, the scrollbar becomes joint for the two parts. Note: In order for the SideNavigation to stretch properly, its parent layout control should only be the sap.tnt.ToolPage.

fireItemSelect.!description:
Fires event itemSelect to attached listeners. Expects the following event parameters:
  • item of type sap.ui.core.ItemThe selected item.

parameters.mArguments: type: Map, description: The arguments to pass along with the event

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.tnt.SideNavigation.

detachItemSelect.!description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the itemSelect event of this sap.tnt.SideNavigation. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object on which the given function had to be called
parameters.fnFunction: type: function, description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

getFooter.!description: Gets content of aggregation footer. Defines the content inside the footer.

getFixedItem.!description: Gets content of aggregation fixedItem. Defines the content inside the fixed part.

getItem.!description: Gets content of aggregation item. Defines the content inside the flexible part.

bindItem.!description: Binds aggregation item to model data. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#bindAggregation ManagedObject.bindAggregation} for a detailed description of the possible properties of oBindingInfo.

parameters.oBindingInfo: type: object, description: The binding information

getExpanded.!description: Gets current value of property expanded. Specifies if the control is expanded. Default value is true.

destroyFooter.!description: Destroys the footer in the aggregation footer.

destroyFixedItem.!description: Destroys the fixedItem in the aggregation fixedItem.

parameters.oFixedItem: type: sap.tnt.NavigationList, description: The fixedItem to set

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.SideNavigation with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.tnt.SideNavigation.!constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new SideNavigation. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object. The supported settings are:
  • Properties
    • {@link #getExpanded expanded} : boolean (default: true)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getItem item} : sap.tnt.NavigationList (default)
    • {@link #getFixedItem fixedItem} : sap.tnt.NavigationList
    • {@link #getFooter footer} : sap.tnt.NavigationList
  • Events
    • {@link #event:itemSelect itemSelect} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.

attachItemSelect.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the itemSelect event of this sap.tnt.SideNavigation. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.tnt.SideNavigation itself. Fired when an item is selected.
attachItemSelect.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: fn(), oListener?: Object) -> sap.tnt.SideNavigation

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.tnt.SideNavigation itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

sap.tnt.SideNavigation.!helpDescription: The SideNavigation control is a container, which consists of flexible and fixed parts on top of each other. The flexible part adapts its size to the fixed one. The flexible part has a scrollbar when the content is larger than the available space. Whenever the height of the whole control is less than 256 pixels, the scrollbar becomes joint for the two parts. Note: In order for the SideNavigation to stretch properly, its parent layout control should only be the sap.tnt.ToolPage.

parameters.oFooter: type: sap.tnt.NavigationList, description: The footer to set

parameters.oItem: type: sap.tnt.NavigationList, description: The item to set

destroyItem.!description: Destroys the item in the aggregation item.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.tnt.ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator.!description:
The ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator control is used in the sap.tnt.ToolHeader control
to specify where the overflow button is placed.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.tnt.ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator.

sap.tnt.ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator.!helpDescription:
The ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator control is used in the sap.tnt.ToolHeader control
to specify where the overflow button is placed.

sap.tnt.NavigationListItem.!description:
The NavigationListItem control represents an action, which can be selected by the user.
It can provide sub items.

removeItem.!description: Removes a item from the aggregation items.

parameters.vItem: type: int|string|sap.tnt.NavigationListItem, description: The itemto remove or its index or id

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.tnt.NavigationListItem.

setHasExpander.!description: Sets a new value for property hasExpander. Specifies if the item has an expander. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bHasExpander: type: boolean, description: New value for property hasExpander

setExpanded.!description: Sets a new value for property expanded. Specifies if the item is expanded. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bExpanded: type: boolean, description: New value for property expanded

fireSelect.!description:
Fires event select to attached listeners. Expects the following event parameters:
  • item of type sap.ui.core.ItemThe selected item.

parameters.mArguments: type: Map, description: The arguments to pass along with the event

attachSelect.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the select event of this sap.tnt.NavigationListItem. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.tnt.NavigationListItem itself. Fired when this item is selected.
attachSelect.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: fn(), oListener?: Object) -> sap.tnt.NavigationListItem

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.tnt.NavigationListItem itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

destroyItems.!description: Destroys all the items in the aggregation items.

getExpanded.!description: Gets current value of property expanded. Specifies if the item is expanded. Default value is true.

removeAllItems.!description: Removes all the controls from the aggregation items. Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

getIcon.!description: Gets current value of property icon. Specifies the icon for the item. Default value is .

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.NavigationListItem with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Item.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

setIcon.!description: Sets a new value for property icon. Specifies the icon for the item. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is .

parameters.sIcon: type: sap.ui.core.URI, description: New value for property icon

addItem.!description: Adds some item to the aggregation items.

parameters.oItem: type: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem, description: the item to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

getItems.!description: Gets content of aggregation items. The sub items.

sap.tnt.NavigationListItem.!constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new NavigationListItem. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object. The supported settings are:
  • Properties
    • {@link #getIcon icon} : sap.ui.core.URI (default: )
    • {@link #getExpanded expanded} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getHasExpander hasExpander} : boolean (default: true)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getItems items} : sap.tnt.NavigationListItem[] (default)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:select select} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Item#constructor sap.ui.core.Item} can be used as well.

indexOfItem.!description: Checks for the provided sap.tnt.NavigationListItem in the aggregation items. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

parameters.oItem: type: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem, description: The item whose index is looked for

sap.tnt.NavigationListItem.!helpDescription:
The NavigationListItem control represents an action, which can be selected by the user.
It can provide sub items.

detachSelect.!description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the select event of this sap.tnt.NavigationListItem. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object on which the given function had to be called
parameters.fnFunction: type: function, description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

getHasExpander.!description: Gets current value of property hasExpander. Specifies if the item has an expander. Default value is true.

insertItem.!description: Inserts a item into the aggregation items.

parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: the 0-based index the item should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the item is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the item is inserted at the last position
parameters.oItem: type: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem, description: the item to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted

sap.tnt.ToolPage.!description: The ToolPage is a layout control, used to put together the parts of a basic tools app - ToolHeader, SideNavigation and contents area.

removeAllMainContents.!description: Removes all the controls from the aggregation mainContents. Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.tnt.ToolPage.

addMainContent.!description: Adds some mainContent to the aggregation mainContents.

parameters.oMainContent: type: sap.ui.core.Control, description: the mainContent to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

getSideExpanded.!description: Gets current value of property sideExpanded. Indicates if the side area is expanded. Overrides the expanded property of the sideContent aggregation. Default value is true.

insertMainContent.!description: Inserts a mainContent into the aggregation mainContents.

parameters.oMainContent: type: sap.ui.core.Control, description: the mainContent to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: the 0-based index the mainContent should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the mainContent is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the mainContent is inserted at the last position

getMainContents.!description: Gets content of aggregation mainContents. The content section.

destroySideContent.!description: Destroys the sideContent in the aggregation sideContent.

parameters.oHeader: type: sap.tnt.ToolHeader, description: The header to set

getHeader.!description: Gets content of aggregation header. The control to appear in the header area.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.ToolPage with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.tnt.ToolPage.!constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new ToolPage. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object. The supported settings are:
  • Properties
    • {@link #getSideExpanded sideExpanded} : boolean (default: true)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getHeader header} : sap.tnt.ToolHeader
    • {@link #getSideContent sideContent} : sap.tnt.SideNavigation
    • {@link #getMainContents mainContents} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.

toggleSideContentMode.!description: Toggles the expand/collapse state of the SideContent.

sap.tnt.ToolPage.!helpDescription: The ToolPage is a layout control, used to put together the parts of a basic tools app - ToolHeader, SideNavigation and contents area.

destroyMainContents.!description: Destroys all the mainContents in the aggregation mainContents.

destroyHeader.!description: Destroys the header in the aggregation header.

parameters.oSideContent: type: sap.tnt.SideNavigation, description: The sideContent to set

indexOfMainContent.!description: Checks for the provided sap.ui.core.Control in the aggregation mainContents. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

parameters.oMainContent: type: sap.ui.core.Control, description: The mainContent whose index is looked for

setSideExpanded.!description: Sets the expand/collapse state of the SideContent.

parameters.isSideExpanded: type: boolean, description: defines whether the SideNavigation is expanded.

getSideContent.!description: Gets content of aggregation sideContent. The side menu of the layout.

removeMainContent.!description: Removes a mainContent from the aggregation mainContents.

parameters.vMainContent: type: int|string|sap.ui.core.Control, description: The mainContentto remove or its index or id

sap.tnt.ToolHeader.!description:
The ToolHeader control is a horizontal container that is most
commonly used to display buttons, labels, selects and other various input controls.

The ToolHeader control is based on sap.m.OverflowToolbar. In addition to the OverflowToolbar,
the user can specify where the overflow button is placed.

parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.tnt.!description: SAPUI5 library with controls specialized for administrative applications.

sideExpanded.!description: Indicates if the side area is expanded. Overrides the expanded property of the sideContent aggregation.

hasExpander.!description: Specifies if the item has an expander.

visible.!description: Whether the control should be visible on the screen. If set to false, a placeholder is rendered instead of the real control

icon.!description: Specifies the icon for the item.

textDirection.!description: Options are RTL and LTR. Alternatively, an item can inherit its text direction from its parent control.

expanded.!description: Specifies if the control is expanded.

sap.tnt.!helpDescription: SAPUI5 library with controls specialized for administrative applications.

busyIndicatorDelay.!description: The delay in milliseconds, after which the busy indicator will show up for this control.

busy.!description: Whether the control is currently in busy state.

fieldGroupIds.!description: The IDs of a logical field group that this control belongs to. All fields in a logical field group should share the same fieldGroupId. Once a logical field group is left, the validateFieldGroup event is raised.

width.!description: Specifies the width of the control.

text.!description: The text to be displayed for the item.

key.!description: Can be used as input for subsequent actions.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.tnt.NavigationList with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created
